meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
readingMnemonic: At a <vocabulary>banquet</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>dinner party</vocabulary>, you don't only get food, you also <reading>歌 GE</reading>T (うたげ), which is you getting a song from a singer, because entertainment is just as important as the food when you have a <vocabulary>feast</vocabulary> such as this.
